articles.title: About Me!
articles.contents:
Experience:
I am an alumni from University of California, Irvine and have had 3+ years in the sustainable non-profit sector where I worked as a project manager in Global Sustainability Research. I have experience in data analysis among several coding languages and platforms such as: R, MATLAB, QGIS, and ArcGIS.
Interests:
Some of my favorite hobbies include painting, horseback riding, hiking, and surfing. I enjoy taking care of my plants and my pet snake, Lola.

articles.title: R programming
articles.contents: This is all of the work I will be showing using R and QGIS to showcase my data analysis and visualization skills

            Ali Martin
          
          
            
              Hello, my name is Ali and welcome to my personal distill website!
              I am currently in my first year as a Master’s student studying Environmental Science and Management with a specialization in Conservation Planning.
              Here is all of my work that I have done in R.
